title: How to make a quarto blog
text: This post contains instruction about how to make your first post using Quarto blog.

title: How to make a quarto blog
text:
Creating a new blog

Open VSCode
Create a new blog project:

Press Ctrl+Shift+P (Windows/Linux) or Cmd+Shift+P (Mac)
Type “Quarto: Create Project”
Select “Blog Project”
Choose a directory for your blog
Enter a title for your blog

Open the project:

Go to File > Open Folder
Select your blog directory

Preview your blog:

Click the “Preview” button in the top right corner of VSCode
Or press Ctrl+Shift+P and type “Quarto: Preview”

title: How to make a quarto blog
text:
Adding a new post

Create a new post:

Right-click on the posts folder
Select “New Folder”
Name it (e.g., “my-first-post”)

Create the post file:

Right-click on your new folder
Select “New File”
Name it “index.qmd”

Add YAML header to your post:
---
title: "My Post Title"
author: "Your Name"
date: "2025-10-06"
categories: [news, analysis]
---
Write your content using markdown
Preview changes:

Click the “Preview” button in the top right corner
Or use Command Palette (Ctrl+Shift+P / Cmd+Shift+P) and type “Quarto: Preview”

title: How to make a quarto blog
text:
Publishing

Render your post
Deploy to GitHub Pages or your preferred hosting service

title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.
